info.name: MangaDB Swagger
info.description:
MangaDB allows you to easily keep track of the mangas you are reading,
want to read, and have already finished reading.

If you have any questions or want to contribute then [![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/Rafase282/Mangadb.svg)](https://gitter.im/Rafase282/Mangadb?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge)

To create an admin account, you must specify it as a comma separated list on the `.env` file.


Contact Support:
 Name: rafase282@gmail.com

request.description: This route does notrequires a JWT. The usesr will get a message pointing to the documentation as there is nothign to do here.
This route does notrequires a JWT. The usesr will get the swagger documentation.

item.name: Authenticates existing users for using the API for one hour.

request.description: This route does notrequires a JWT, but instead provides one for the user that expires in one hour. The response provides the JWT along with some useful information.

item.name: Authenticates users for using the API for 5 minutes for password reset purposes..

request.description: This route does not requires a JWT, but instead provides one  for the user that expires in five minutes. The  response provides the  JWT along with some useful information. This is used to get temporary access to change a password. The token will be sent via email and not returned on the payload.

item.name: Gets a list of all mangas on the database.

request.description: The admin uses this route to get a list of all the mangas and their data regardless of the user. Good for checking when you don't have access to the databse directly.

response.name: Ok

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.body:
{
 "success": true,
 "message": "mollit sit",
 "data": [
  {
   "title": "consectetur",
   "author": "ad",
   "url": "commodo exercitation veniam in ullamco",
   "userStatus": "Duis proident officia irure",
   "type": "adipisicing amet",
   "categories": [
    "deserunt ad sunt",
    "enim velit nulla"
   ],
   "chapter": 71877044,
   "seriesStatus": "consequat Ex",
   "plot": "aliqua Lorem ea",
   "direction": "elit",
   "thumbnail": "dolor velit aute amet",
   "altName": [
    "nisi aliqua sit",
    "enim ut proident"
   ],
   "userId": "vel",
   "username": "nostrud d",
   "__v": -39550437,
   "_id": "consectetur labore exercitation"
  },
  {
   "title": "enim consectetur eu ullamco",
   "author": "labore ut tempor veniam aute",
   "url": "reprehenderit nis",
   "userStatus": "laborum Excep",
   "type": "fugiat incididunt irure id",
   "categories": [
    "Lorem ex incididunt tempor",
    "dolore do tempor cupidatat sunt"
   ],
   "chapter": -13248260,
   "seriesStatus": "nostrud",
   "plot": "cillum exercitation dolor",
   "direction": "sit occaecat irure",
   "thumbnail": "sit dolor nostrud",
   "altName": [
    "nulla dolore",
    "consectetur"
   ],
   "userId": "sint in",
   "username": "occaecat irure non",
   "__v": -76359634,
   "_id": "reprehenderit occaecat"
  }
 ]
}

urlencoded.description: (Required) Whether the user is currently reading or not.
(Required) Whether the series is ongoing or not.
(Required) The reading direction of the manga.
(Required) Direct url to a thumbnail of the manga.

request.description: The manga title should be unique. Please see the `Manga Schema`.

response.name: Ok

item.name: Updates any and all manga fields by manga id.

urlencoded.description: (Required) The field can vary depending on what you want to update. use any or all the fields of the `MangaObj`

request.description: This route allows to update the whole object or part of it.  If you want to update specific fields,  then just add the fields you want to update only.

response.name: Ok

item.name: Get a list of all the users in the database.

request.description: The route provides an array of user objects containing the details of the users.  However, passwords are always encrypted so admin can't read them.

response.name: Ok

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.body:
{
 "success": false,
 "message": "qui ",
 "data": [
  {
   "username": "dolor",
   "password": "Duis in tempor",
   "email": "e",
   "firstname": "officia et",
   "lastname": "ullamco occaecat",
   "__v": 64422352,
   "_id": "dolore Excepteur occaecat"
  },
  {
   "username": "in sint do",
   "password": "ea",
   "email": "exercitation eu mollit adipisicing enim",
   "firstname": "occaecat officia id",
   "lastname": "ea sit reprehenderit quis",
   "__v": 11587159,
   "_id": "non irure nisi"
  }
 ]
}

item.name: Deletes all users but the admin.

request.description: This route deletes the target user. However, it does not deletes its mangas.  So further action should be taken via `/mangas/{username`.
